args:
  - /shared/launch.sh
  - bosco
  - data_s2_2018_19_tps
  - "[2018,2019]"
  - deforestation_2018_19_tps
image: ghcr.io/tn-aixpa/rs-deforestation:0.14.6
task: container+job://deforestation/6c7cc68bc6af48cfb7e08b0172c8d77c
function: container://deforestation/elaborate:b16ab30918d14dfc96354c8aa067ec44
volumes:
  - name: volume-deforestation
    spec:
      size: 250Gi
    volume_type: persistent_volume_claim
    mount_path: /app/data
resources:
  cpu:
    requests: "6"
    limits: "12"
  mem:
    requests: 32Gi
    limits: 64Gi
source:
  source: launch.sh
  base64: 
fs_group: 8877
command: /bin/bash
local_execution: false
